title: PBE Bug
body:
I was playing as daruis on the pbe in the new rift, and the tool tip for his passive is bugged, it says what it says in the champion shop, aka it's not showing the numbers for how much damage the bleed does, nor does it mention the move speed he gains during it. I tested it with both the skin on, and off, and on both rifts, and it is a thing with daruis

TL:DR {{champion:122}} 's tool tip isn't working properly

replies.body: Is this for his Skill icon or is this on the buff icon?

> Is this for his Skill icon or is this on the buff icon?

it's the tool tip for the passive skill
